attributes.action: insure every single public building in the United Kingdom gains all its energy from renewable energy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i beleive that if the Prime minister and his government beleive in turning the country carbon neutrol it should set an example for the rest of us to follow. therfore making every single public building, including councils, hospitals, schools, mod buildings, fire stations, police stations and all other buildings that are used by the government to be self sufficent with electricity is an excellent way of showing us they are comited to the cause
